description: This file is a Gradle build script written in Kotlin DSL for configuring an Android application project. It specifies plugins, Android build settings, dependencies, and build features specific to the project 'post_playback_rating_frontend'.

methods.name: project.findProperty
methods.description: Retrieves a project property value, used here to override build config fields.

methods.name: getDefaultProguardFile
methods.description: Provides default Proguard configuration file for release builds.
